title: I am currently studying in 8th standard and my age is more than 14 years. Can I attend the 10th examination next year from NIOS? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can appear under open schooling NIOS BOARD date is still open may close any time so quick you need adhaar card photo signature Date of birth must be in form of day month and year you may get further information on 9878108064
